name: BASE44 2.0
tagline: The all-in-one app building platform. No integrations needed
description: Base44 is the only all-in-one platform that empowers anyone to create software. From tools and personal apps - to complete online businesses‚Äîwithout writing a single line of code (unless you want to üòâ).

name: Flexpoint
tagline: A single storefront for creators to sell anything
description: Flexpoint is the all-in-one platform for creators to sell coaching calls, digital products, services, and more ‚Äî all under their own brand. Ditch the tool overload and run your business from one beautiful, Stripe-powered storefront.

name: LiftmyCV
tagline: AI agent that finds jobs and auto-applies on your behalf
description: Tired of filling out the same job application forms over and over? Exhausted from browsing dozens of job search websites? I've got you covered! Meet LiftmyCV ‚Äì an AI agent that finds job openings and auto-applies on your behalf. No subscription required.

name: Lamatic 2.0
tagline: IDE to build & deploy AI agents on serverless
description: A fully managed PaaS with Agent IDE, integrated vector stores, and seamless connections to apps, data sources, and leading AI models ‚Äî empowering you to rapidly build, test, and deploy high-performance AI Agents at the Serverless Edge.

name: TikTok Super Tool
tagline: Get insights and analytics for any Tiktok profile
description: The most comprehensive TikTok profile analysis tool. Get deep insights, download videos, analyze hashtags, and access sounds. Perfect for creators and marketers.

name: Krea Video Training
tagline: Train AI to create videos in your style
description: Krea Video Training is the fine-tune Krea's AI video model with your own images/videos to create custom styles, motions, and objects. Control the AI, don't just prompt it!

name: GPT Rules
tagline: Supercharge your AI chats with cursor style rules
description: GPT Rules brings Cursor-style rules to your browser, letting you create custom rules for consistent, high-quality AI responses every time.

name: Pocketlink
tagline: Reimagine your link-in-bio experience, powered by AI
description: A new and revolutionizing way to create a customizable link-in-bio page with Pocketlink. Monetize your audience, track analytics, and grow your online presence with our AI tools.

name: intura
tagline: Compare, test, and optimize AI models
description: A platform that helps you compare, test, and optimize AI models, making it easier to select the best-performing and most cost-effective AI for their needs. This is our first launch and we would love to have your feedback on the beta! (we're all ears üê∞)

name: Interview Code Ace
tagline: The ultimate, invisible AI powered tool for interviews
description: The ultimate, invisible AI powered tool to help you succeed in technical interviews. Practice, prepare, and perform with confidence.

name: ARize ‚Äì Shop Anything in AR
tagline: View Any Product in AR from Any Site or Marketplace
description: Revolutionizing online shopping with AR. Turn ANY product image from ANY online store into a 3D model & see it in AR in your space before buying. Works with Amazon, eBay, AliExpress, and more. No more guessing, no more surprises - just smarter shopping in AR.

name: Searchbirds
tagline: A simpler, ad-free search engine
description: Making a simpler search engine for people to use. It has a cute logo, and just an overall cozy feel. It gets updates almost daily as well.

name: EOR Overview
tagline: Find and compare 140+ Employer of Record (EOR) providers!
description: Compare Employer of Record providers with verified data on pricing, features, and country coverage. Our platform is built on the principle that there's no universally "best" EOR provider ‚Äì only the one that best fits your specific needs and requirements.

name: Reelvis
tagline: Create reels for your brand on instagram, tiktok and youtube
description: Reelvis is an all-in-one tool for creating reels on social media. It generates video scripts, adds captions, and provides professional voiceovers-all in a few clicks. Automate video production and keep your audience engaged effortlessly!

name: Bandera AI
tagline: No More Manual Work. Just Sales
description: Bandera AI transforms your sales process with intelligent lead generation and seamless automation, delivering qualified prospects directly to your inbox.

name: Agreemint AI
tagline: AI agreement builder and reviewer
description: Your AI partner for creating and reviewing legal agreements‚Äîminus the complexity of legal jargons.

name: Showmehow
tagline: Turn websites into instant video tutorials
description: ShowMeHow creates how-to videos for any website feature automatically. Enter a URL, pick features, download tutorial - done.

name: Educhain
tagline: Turn any web page into Quiz
description: Educhain: AI-powered Chrome extension that turns any webpage into a learning tool with summaries and quizzes.

name: Never Studio
tagline: Video production services
description: Neverstudio.in offers AI-powered branding, video production, and podcasts, creating high-impact content for businesses through creativity and advanced technology.

name: AIVantage
tagline: Empowering people with the best affordable and accessible AI
description: AIVantage is THE BEST AI-powered platform. Access all the top LLMs with full chat context renewal as can you switch between models in the same chat without losing progress, an AI-enhanced task scheduler and Gmail integration.
